jetpack-related-posts.title: INWED 2020 – Luany Dantas
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Luany Dantas is a Naval Architect and Marine Engineer in our Rio de Janeiro office. Her duties include Vessel Stability and Inclining Tests, Anchoring and Tow Plans, Structural Engineering, Marine Warranty.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Tristein merges with AqualisBraemar
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: 4 February 2015 – Aqualis ASA (OSE: Aqua) has decided to merge the operations of Tristein AS into AqualisBraemar AS. Oslo-listed Aqualis ASA acquired Norwegian company Tristein AS in April 2014. Tristein has since operated as a stand-alone entity as part of the Aqualis Group. Now the company is being…

jetpack-related-posts.title: OWC successfully completes the supervision & management of the onshore & overwater cable route site investigation for the East Anglia ONE offshore windfarm
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Offshore Wind Consultants Ltd (OWC), part of the AqualisBraemar group, has successfully completed the supervision and management of the onshore and overwater cable route site investigation for the East Anglia ONE offshore windfarm off the east coast of the UK. This was a high profile and complex investigation using a…

jetpack-related-posts.title: New European head for AqualisBraemar
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar has appointed Mark Lomas as director of the company’s European operation.

jetpack-related-posts.title: AqualisBraemar appoints group marketing director
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar has appointed John MacAskill its first group marketing director.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Q3 2019 financial results
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Q3 2019 was our first full quarter operating as the combined company AqualisBraemar, following the acquisition of Braemar Technical Services.
